term.title: skeletal structure

item.text: The sequence of atoms in the constitutional unit(s) of a macromolecule, an oligomer molecule, a block or a chain which defines the essential topological representation.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2287. 'Glossary of basic terms in polymer science (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2296 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122287)

term.citation: Citation: 'skeletal structure' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.S05708

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
